name: escape (itch) (snzy)
description: escape is about a triangle that you can control, you have to use A + D to move and SPACE to jump. On every level you have to reach the flag, currently there are only 3 levels, but i plan to add more in the future, start menu didn't work so I'll add that later. (Made in Unity Engine) (BUG: Sometimes you cannot jump, i will fix this in the next patch)
